definitions: (especially in the US) a charge of misconduct made against the holder of a public office

examples.text: the president is facing impeachment over the scandal
all impeachments shall be tried by the Senate

shortDefinitions: charge of misconduct made against holder of public office

definitions: a charge of treason or another crime against the state

examples.text: the king cynically abandoned him, encouraging his impeachment

shortDefinitions: charge of treason or another crime against state

definitions: the action of calling into question the integrity or validity of something

examples.text: the prosecutor's detailed impeachment of the character witness

shortDefinitions: action of calling into question integrity or validity of something
